title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog not shown when dataset is not set
description: When a table report item is added and the dataset is not set, the group dialog should still be accessible to allow the user to define a group. However, currently, the group dialog is not shown in this scenario.
OB: When attempting to define a group for a table report item without setting the dataset, nothing happens and no error message is displayed.
EB:
Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set. To reproduce: 
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset. 
2. Attempt to create a new table group. 
3. The group dialog should be accessible and allow the user to define the group, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Attempt to create a new table group.
3. Verify that the group dialog is accessible and allows the user to define the group, even if the dataset is not defined.
